Consider the following differences between Hath Yoga and Ashtanga Yoga:
  1. While the Hatha yoga concentrates mainly on the two limbs of Yoga, Ashtanga Yoga focuses on all the eight limbs
  2. While there is no transition between the postures in Hath Yoga, there is transition between postures in Ashtanga
  Which of the above statements is/are correct?
